   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Parsl - Parallel Scripting Library
##################################

This is an experiment on bringing `data dependency based implicit parallelism <http://swift-lang.org/main/>`_ to Python.

Contents:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
